title: Oil prices fall as Iran sees progress in nuclear talks with U.S.
summary_full: Iran and the U.S. reached a "general agreement" on Tuesday on guiding principles during talks in Geneva, Foreign Minister Abbas Araghchi said
summary_public: Iran and the U.S. reached a "general agreement" on Tuesday on guiding principles during talks in Geneva, Foreign Minister Abbas Araghchi said

IR.label: positive
IR.evidence: Iran sees progress in nuclear talks with U.S.
